###### **Overview**

Engineering Doctorate (Eng.Doc) is a mixed mode doctoral programme that embed the industrially-focused area into research with an aim of solving real-life-work-based problems. It combines research in engineering which incorporates training in business with management skills into developing innovative solutions to technological products or processes.

The Eng.Doc graduates will have equivalent doctoral-level qualification with more industrially-based focused than the conventional Doctor of Philosophy. Research which aimed in solving real problems are able to make decisions inclusive of technical knowledge, business management and opportunity and contribute to innovative solutions

[MQA](https://www2.mqa.gov.my/mqr/english/epapariptaAA.cfm?IDAkrKP=15039)

###### **Programme Educational Objectives**

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Knowledgeable and technically competent in applying engineering business management knowledge that can give an impact to the industry and society.

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Expert in engineering management research field that considers the latest knowledge, act with integrity and aligned to professional conduct.

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Innovative in solving real industry problems and competent in decision making based on engineering business management and organizational knowledge.

###### **Learning Outcomes**

Upon completion of the program requirements, the graduate will be able to:

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Integrates advanced engineering business management knowledge in managing operation and organization management issues.

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Evaluates problems critically and proposes appropriate solutions in engineering business management context.

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Strengthens practical and technical skills in engineering business management fields through advanced research and management tools.

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Collaborates with colleagues, scholarly communities and other stakeholders to support ideas and solutions of engineering business management issues.

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Convincingly communicates the knowledge, skills, ideas and research findings using appropriate methods to peers, scholarly communities and societies through various mediums.

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Adapts a wide range of suitable digital technologies or appropriate applications to enhance study, research or work practice.

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Evaluates critically numerical and graphical data in solving engineering business management problems.

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Demonstrates leadership in research and development of own work and others with full responsibility.

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Displays lifelong learning initiatives to enhance innovative research towards Industry 4.0.

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Proposes business opportunities in engineering business management field.

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Adheres ethical values and professionalism in executing duties and responsibilities towards economic, social and environmental sustainability.

The normal requirement for admission to the programme is a four-year bachelor degree recognized by the university in either engineering or sciences.
